Guilty

2020 | 1h 59m | Drama

When a college heartthrob is accused of rape by a less popular student, his girlfriend navigates various versions of the story in search of the truth.

Starring: Kiara Advani,Akansha Ranjan Kapoor,Gurfateh Pirzada

The Tweet That Started It | Guilty Scene | Kiara Advani, Gurfateh | Netflix India

Among a wave of accusations, comes one more when Tanu tweets about VJ allegedly raping her. VJ's girlfriend, Nanki, and the whole college are in a state of shock. But what really happened? Find out in Guilty, streaming now on Netflix.
